feed.title: LF-Air
feed.subtitle: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

entry.title: Vite report on Mon, 25 Dec 2023 20:01:40
entry.summary: In the world, there is a growing recognition of the potential benefits of artificial intelligence (AI) in education. Instead of rejecting this technology, educators are now encouraged to look at how artists are embracing AI and incorporate it into their teaching methods. Meanwhile, a family has recently moved from the US to Canada in search of a fresh start. Although not without its flaws, Canada seems to be making efforts to improve their lives. Additionally, an individual shares their experience of majoring in computer science and finding that the job market is tougher than anticipated. On a different note, a recent report highlights the 20 most affordable and fast-growing cities in the US, with two of the top five cities located in Texas.
